input.sentences: today was the day of the race . they started out in the water .
after that was the five mile run .
[male] pulled ahead at the last minute .
here he is at the front of everyone almost halfway through .
output.sentences: The folks in the water participated in the boat portion of the race.
This man will participate in the race on his bike.
These folks will try to run their fastest miles.
Since he pulled his muscle, his time is slow by a minute, and this hurts his male pride.
This racer is halfway to the front of the pack.
